problem.markdown:
>>Which two type of relationships are supported in the Excel data model?<<
[x] One-to-one [x] One-to-many [ ] Many-to-many
[explanation] Excel data model does not support many-to-many relationship. [explanation]
problem.p: Which two type of relationships are supported in the Excel data model?

checkboxgroup.label: Which two type of relationships are supported in the Excel data model?

div.p: Excel data model does not support many-to-many relationship.
